title: Jeremy Corbyn – 2022 Comments on Opposing NATO Expansion
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jeremy Corbyn, the Independent MP for Islington North, on 22 February 2022.
content:
The Russian forces that have entered Eastern Ukraine should immediately withdraw.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

The UK government should encourage a return to the Minsk-2 agreement to end the crisis and oppose further eastward NATO expansion.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

Diplomacy must resume.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
